      • checkResponseAndThrow

        public static void checkResponseAndThrow(retrofit2.Response response)
                                  throws InvalidParameterException,
                                         PolicySignatureException,
                                         ResourceNotFoundException,
                                         InternalException
        Checks responses from any of the Filestack APIs. Throws an appropriate exception based on the HTTP status code.
        Parameters:
        response - response from Filestack API
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - on a 400 response
        PolicySignatureException - on a 403 response
        ResourceNotFoundException - on a 404 response
        InternalException - on a 500 response

      • castExceptionAndThrow

                                  throws InvalidParameterException,
                                         java.io.IOException,
                                         PolicySignatureException,
                                         ResourceNotFoundException,
                                         ValidationException,
                                         InternalException
        Takes an Throwable and recasts it to one of the FilestackException classes.
        Parameters:
        throwable - generic object to cast and rethrow
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException
        java.io.IOException
        PolicySignatureException
        ResourceNotFoundException
        ValidationException

        public static java.io.File createWriteFile(java.lang.String pathname)
                                    throws ValidationException
        Creates and validates a new File for writing.
        Parameters:
        pathname - path to file
        Returns:
        file pointing to pathname
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if the pathname can't be created or exists but is unusable

        Parameters:
        pathname - path to file
        Returns:
        file pointing to pathname
